title: UC COVID-19 Vaccine and Booster Requirements
cleaned_text: UC COVID-19 Vaccination Policy Requirement The University's requirement is either completion of a WHO-approved COVID-19 primary vaccine series OR submission of a declination form on [eTang](https://uhs.berkeley.edu/etang.berkeley.edu). Declination / Exemption Process The policy allows for submitting an opt-out/declination of getting the COVID-19 vaccine.
